name: Rain Game (KasperM.)
description:
Rain game is a survival sandbox game.

When the timer runs out there will be a bit of rain, every time the amount of rain increases, by the way the rain is a little bit deadly. You can build a bunker to protect you from the rain. You can harvest materials and even craft different items with them.

To move you can either use your arrow keys, aswd or qzsd.

To aces your inventory you  can use the i button.
